Name: Anime Hunter
About the game: Anime Hunter is a crazy action rpg game where your deepest fantasies come to life! You are a hunter, a mighty predator. Use your crossbow to hunt anime girls. But you do not use arrows. Your crossbow shoots with dildos! Hit anime girls, collect their underwear, buy upgrades, collect power ups and dominate! Benefits: Absolutely crazy and insane gameplay Cute anime girls for your pleasure 16 various upgrades and power ups Roguelike difficulty increase Two different soundtracks Nudity and adult content Fancy graphics and ragdoll physics Photomode for your best moments Global ranking system and achievements Unleash your primal beast. Let's show these naughty girls who is the boss here!
